name: Parry Panic
description:
1. Added a parry. By pressing the shift key, the player will put away their gun and hold up a shield for 1/2 of a second. If any attacks hit at this time, the player will gain one use of a special attack. If the player does not take damage during this time, it takes one extra second to re-equip the pistol or parry.

2. Up to 3 special attacks can be stored at once. By pressing right-click, the player will fire a more powerful blast from their pistol than normal.

3. Added a HUD element that displays the number of special attacks that the player has available to them at any given point in time.

Created by: Aidan O'Rourke

With assets from MSU

Songs:

Abyssal Time - Devil May Cry 5

Blazing Muscle - Devil May Cry 5

Both composed by Yoshiya Terayama

The parry sound effect is taken from Street Fighter III: Third Strike
